properties.name: aws.region
properties.description: AWS region for Secrets Manager access

properties.name: aws.secrets.openai-api-key-secret-name
properties.description: Name of the secret in AWS Secrets Manager containing the OpenAI API key

properties.name: openai.api.url
properties.description: Base URL for the OpenAI API

properties.name: openai.model
properties.description: OpenAI model to use for chat completions

properties.name: openai.temperature
properties.description: Temperature parameter for OpenAI API (controls randomness)

properties.name: openai.max-tokens
properties.description: Maximum number of tokens in the OpenAI API response

properties.name: openai.timeout-seconds
properties.description: Timeout in seconds for OpenAI API requests

properties.name: services.client-service.url
properties.description: URL of the client service microservice

properties.name: services.transaction-service.url
properties.description: URL of the transaction service microservice

properties.name: services.user-service.url
properties.description: URL of the user service microservice

properties.name: services.timeout
properties.description: Timeout in seconds for microservice HTTP requests
